title: FinanceLedger
description: A financial account ledger entry used by the Finance Program Agent.

entry_id.description: UUID v4 identifier for the ledger entry.

account_id.description: Opaque reference to the financial account. Must not expose account numbers directly.

amount.description: Transaction amount. Negative values represent debits; positive values represent credits.

running_balance.description: Account balance after this entry is applied.

tags.description: Optional user-defined tags for filtering and reporting.
